title: The Donald are suggesting that Illhan Omar's concerns over American citizens abroad, in Trump's hotels, is actually her threatening to bomb them. Yet again, in their eyes, every single Muslim is a terrorist

author: pieohmy25
text: I’m going to go ahead and say I honestly doubt that no one in the Iranian government thought of Trumps properties before Omar tweeted about it.

author: pieohmy25
text: If they are bombed, the only people linking it to Omar will be right wing fanatics, which frankly, who gives a fuck what they think.

author: pieohmy25
text:
Who cares. If you’re unsure of Trump after the child camps or the endless lying then well that’s on you.

We’re in this mess because the Dems thought your line of thought was correct, the only way to win is to go to the middle. It doesn’t work, middle America is full of barely functioning assholes.

author: pieohmy25
text: The Dems ran a sloppy campaign by pulling right and ignoring the rest of the party as “far left radicals” for saying things like, we shouldn’t go to war.

author: pieohmy25
text:
Hillary got 3 million more votes than Trump. So no, Bernie supporters did not elect Trump.

The constant scorn from moderate Democrats towards those left of Reagan since 2016 will likely sway a larger portion of further left voters to not vote or to vote for a third party. The DNCs decision that middle of the road politics is the way to go will be the death of the party.

Let’s remember the DNC before the Clintons took the reigns, back when it was a big tent party and there wasn’t this insane derision. It’s quaint looking back now. Sad that the moderates haven’t learned a single lesson in two decades.
